description: Select a frame by its (zero-based) index or by its name or ID or using its previously located OpenQA.Selenium.IWebElement.

examples.description: Select a frame by its (zero-based) index.
Select a frame by its name or ID.
Select a frame using its previously located OpenQA.Selenium.IWebElement.

name: SwitchToFrame

properties.onElement: The locator value by which the element will be found.
properties.locator: The locator type by which the element will be found.
properties.argument: The (zero-based) index, name or ID of the frame.

summary: Select a frame, changing web-driver context to the new selected frame.
